org.dapper.server.flow

Interface EmbeddingCodelet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Codelet, FlowBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FanSubflow, ForkBomb

    public interface EmbeddingCodelet
extends Codelet, FlowBuilder
    An extension of Codelet that surveys its input to determine embedding parameters on the client side and doubles as a FlowBuilder for embedding a subflow on the server side.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getEmbeddingParameters()
      Gets the server-side embedding parameters.
      void setEmbeddingParameters(Node parameters)
      Sets the client-side embedding parameters.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dapper.codelet.Codelet

        run, toString

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dapper.server.flow.FlowBuilder

        build
